newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mostly higher on rising turnover.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mostly higher on rising turnover.

text.p: Croatian stocks traded mostly higher on rising volume and turnover on Tuesday, with slight losses among hoteliers.
* Six of ten active issues rose, two fell and two were flat.
* Volume rose to 12,032 units, turnover three times higher at 7 million kuna.
* Top gainer Zagrebacka Banka jumped 130 kuna to 1,200 with 3,448 units sold.
* Biggest decliner hotelier Arena inched down two kuna to 140, selling 467 shares sold.
* Most active drugs firm Pliva edged up ten kuna to 415 on volume of 5,777 shares.
